title: 1670: When Lifting Light Builds More Muscle
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin cover scenarios where lifting light actually produces better results.

  • The advantages/disadvantages of training men versus women. (2:21)
  • Seven Scenarios When Lifting Light Actually Builds More Muscle. (7:30)
  • #1 – Correctional or Rehab. (8:08)
  • #2 – Training for the Pump. (15:13)
  • #3 – Isolating Specific Muscles. (22:12)
  • #4 – Practicing the Skill. (24:51)
  • #5 – Adding more Frequency. (30:51)
  • #6 – Deload Week. (36:10)
  • #7 – Some Exercises Lend Themselves Better for Light Weight. (40:39)
